1.1.name: wordpress/q-sensei-search-widget
1.1.description:
About the Plugin

This Plugin allows to start a search at Q-Sensei.com directly from your WordPress Blog.

Q-Sensei - Your Guide through the World's Information

Qsensei introduces a new way of making information accessible. Its goal is to provide advanced search tools for the vast amount of information available nowadays on the Internet, in books, research articles, blogs, news, or wikis. They currently provide access to the first several million scholarly articles. Qsensei's approach applies innovative search technologies to various heterogeneous data pools; their users can easily browse through a data source as well as discover cross-references between individual records.

Try out Q-Sensei!
